params._l1MessageService: Canonical message service contract on L1.
params._l1TokenBridge: Canonical token bridge contract on L1.

params.target: Contract on Linea that will receive message.

params.amount: Amount of L1 tokens to deposit and L2 tokens to receive.

relayMessage(address,bytes).notice: Send cross-chain message to target on Linea.

userdoc.notice: Supports sending messages and tokens from L1 to Linea.
